document.full_text: ritish voters punished the liberal democrats for their role in a deficit-cutting government friday, deserting the party in local elections and almost certainly rejecting its efforts to reform the electoral system.
document.title: britons punish lib dems for coalition role
lines_and_colors: ritish voters punished the liberal democrats for their role in a deficit-cutting government friday, deserting the party in local elections and almost certainly rejecting its efforts to reform the electoral system.
